articles.author: Timothy Malcolm
articles.title: NASA Curiosity rover finds proof pointing toward a habitable Mars - Chron
articles.description: Caltech scientists published a study using NASA Curiosity rover imagery showing the past existence of warm water on Mars.
articles.content:
NASA's Curiosity rover has found evidence that conditions on the planet Mars may have been hospitable for life.
Heritage Images/Getty Images
It has been a trying time for NASA, what with astronauts… [+2452 chars]
